train_set.path: <path to the conllu file with the train set

dev_set.path: <path to the conllu file with the development set>
dev_set.results_path: <path to save annotated dev set> optional parameter

test_set.path: <path to the conllu file with the test set>
test_set.results_path: <path to save annotated test set> optional parameter
